_header: The holy Rood that was I-found as thee wit in May
Note: This is incorporated in the Laud ‘Sancta Crux’ — see 5337.
Subjects: Cross, feast of the Exaltation of
_description: The ‘Exaltation’ of the Cross in the South English Legendary

BodAsh43.Transcription:
þE holi rode was ifounde as ȝe witeþ in may& an
                    haused was in septembre þe holi rode day…
BodAsh43.Attributed Title: þe holy Rod in May kynge Cosdre (f. 68)
BodAsh43.Editions:
Morris,  Richard,
                        ed.  
             Legends of the Holy Rood, Symbols of the Passion, and
                Cross-Poems.
EETS
         o.s. 46 (1871); repr. 1973: 48-57.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
ÞE holi Roode was i founde as ȝe witeþ in
                    MayHonoured he was seþþe in Septembre þe holi Rode
                    day…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Now God for þe Rode loue þat he was on i doBring vs
                    to þe heiȝe Ioye þat he vs bouȝte to
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.
BodEngPoeta1.Editions:
Morris,  Richard,
                        ed.  
             Legends of the Holy Rood, Symbols of the Passion, and
                Cross-Poems.
EETS
         o.s. 46 (1871); repr. 1973: 48-57.

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
ÞE holy Rode was y founde As ȝe witteþ in
                    mayEnhaunced it was in Septembre on þe holy Rode
                    day…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…Lord Ihesu Crist þat on þe Rode were y doBring vs
                    to þe ioye of heuene þat þu vs bouhtest to
BodLauMis463.Note: Two columns per page, one full-line, the other half-line.

CamCCC145.First Lines:
ÞE holy rode þat was ifonde as ȝe witeþ in
                    mayAn haused he was in septembre þe holi rode day…
CamCCC145.Last Lines:
…Moni miracles þer habbeþ ibeo wo so is telle
                    couþeOf þe swete rode an eorþe suþþe telle me
                    somme nouþe
CamCCC145.Editions:
D’Evelyn,  Charlotte,  and  A. J. Mill, eds.  
             The South English Legendary: Corpus Christi College Cambridge MS. 145
                and British Museum MS. Harley 2277, with variants from Bodley MS. Ashmole 43 and
                British Museum MS. Cotton Julius D.ix.
EETS
         o.s. 235 (1959), 236 (1956); repr. 1967: 2.390.

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Þe holy Rode was yffounde as ȝe wel witeþ in MayAn
                    haunsed ȝeo was in Septembre in þe ffourteþe
                    day…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…Now god ffor þe loue of þe Rodeþat þou were on
                    ydoBryng vs in þulke ioye þat þou vs bouȝtest
                    to

CamTCC605.First Lines:
þe holy rode was yfounde as ȝe wytyn on mayon hausyd hit
                    was on septembre þe holy rode day…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…god for loue of þe rode þat þu were on
                    idobringe ous to þe heyȝe Ioie þat þu ous bouȝtyst
                    to

BLAdd10301.First Lines:
Þe holy rode þat was y fonde as ȝe witeþ in
                    MayAn haused he was in septembre þe holy rode day
BLAdd10301.Last Lines:
…Nou god for þe Rode love þat þou were on y
                    doBring vs to þe heie Ioye þat þou vs boȝtst
                    to
BLAdd10301.Attributed Title:
De exaltatione sancte crucis (f. 165, by scribe in margin beside
                    first line); Exaltacio sancte crucis (RT)

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: Þe holi rode þat was ifounde as ȝe witeþ in maian hauseþ was in septembre þe holi rode dai…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …nou god for þe loue of þe suete rode þat þu were on idobring vs to þe heie ioie þat þu boutest ous to
BLCottJulDIX.Note: “Capitulum xxxix” added to left margin by later hand (f. 71v).

BLEge1993.First Lines: Þe holi rode was founden as þe witeþ in mayAnd haunsed was in septembre þe holi rode day…
BLEge1993.Last Lines: …God for loue of þe rode þar þou were on idoBring vs to þe heiȝe ioie þat þou vs bouȝtest to

BLEge2810.First Lines: Þe holi rode þat was yfounde as ȝe witiþ in mayAn hausid he was in Septembre þe holy rode day…
BLEge2810.Last Lines: …Mo miraculs of þe cros ȝet ȝe schal hereful god þinge hit is if ȝe wil lere
BLEge2810.Note: Last two lines added (over erasure?) by another hand.

BLEge2891.First Lines: …y him þat þou þe makedest after þat þolede for us wondeHote þou wolle on him bileue þou schelt here in a stonde…
BLEge2891.Last Lines: …Nou god for þe rode lous þat þou were on idoBring us to þe heie ioie þat þou us boȝtest two
BLEge2891.Note: Begins incomplete due to missing folio or folios between 132 and 133.

BLHar2250.First Lines:
The holy rode þat was founden as ȝe weten in mayEnhawsid
                    was in Septembre the holy rode day…
BLHar2250.Last Lines:
…Now god for thi mecull pyne þat on þe rode was
                    idoBringe vs to the hegh ioy þat yow bought vs to

Lam223.First Lines:
ÞE holy Rode þat was fonde as weten in MaijHonoured was
                    in septembre þe holy Rode day…
Lam223.Last Lines:
…And lete him cristen als soone as he myȝt come
                    þertoNow god for þe Rode loue þat þou was on y
                    doBringe vs to þe ioye of heuen þat þou boȝt vs to
                    Amen

TokyoTak54.First Lines:
The holy rode as we wete wel was found in mayAnd in þe hede of
                    Septembre is þe holy rode day…
TokyoTak54.Last Lines:
…Now for þat holy cros þat þou were on idoBring
                    vs to þat ilk blisse þat þou vs bouȝtest to.
                    Amen
